recommendationsInformation.aboutRecommendation: http://anonymous.org/data/RecCOPD-SmokingCessationDecreaseALSShould suggests application of smoking cessation therapy, because application of smoking cessation therapy has: positive contribution to Decrease airflow limitation severity resulting into Having a low airflow limitation severity when inhaling and exhaling of airflow limitation severity (Smoking cessation has the greatest capacity to influence the natural history of COPD. If effective resources and time are dedicated to smoking cessation, long term quit success rates of up to 25% can be achieved);
recommendationsInformation.text: Clinician should encourage patient to quit smoking
recommendationsInformation.motivation: Smoking cessation has the greatest capacity to influence the natural history of COPD. If effective resources and time are dedicated to smoking cessation, long term quit success rates of up to 25% can be achieved

value.display: Having a high airflow limitation severity when inhaling and exhaling
Having a low airflow limitation severity when inhaling and exhaling

recommendationsInformation.aboutRecommendation: http://anonymous.org/data/RecCOPD-LabaDecreaseCOPDStage2Should suggests administration of LABA, because administration of LABA has: positive contribution to Decrease COPD stage resulting into a mild airflow limitation severity of COPD stage (Initial therapy should consist of a long acting bronchodilator; long acting are recommended over short acting inhaled bronchodilators);

interactionsInformation.explanatoryText: http://anonymous.org/data/RecCOPD-LamaDecreaseCOPDStage2Should which suggests administration of LAMA was considered as a(n) alternative recommendation but http://anonymous.org/data/RecCOPD-LabaDecreaseCOPDStage2Should is acceptable in the presence of http://anonymous.org/data/RecCOPD-LamaDecreaseCOPDStage2Should

http://anonymous.org/data/RecCOPD-LamaDecreaseCOPDStage2Should which suggests administration of LAMA was considered as a(n) repetition recommendation but http://anonymous.org/data/RecCOPD-LabaDecreaseCOPDStage2Should is acceptable in the presence of http://anonymous.org/data/RecCOPD-LamaDecreaseCOPDStage2Should

recommendationsInformation.motivation: Initial therapy should consist of a long acting bronchodilator; long acting are recommended over short acting inhaled bronchodilators

recommendationsInformation.aboutRecommendation: http://anonymous.org/data/RecCOPD-LabaLamaDecreaseCOPDStage2Should suggests administration of LABA + LAMA, because administration of LABA + LAMA has: positive contribution to Decrease COPD stage resulting into a mild airflow limitation severity of COPD stage (A combination of bronchodilators is recommended as initial therapy for patients with  severe breathlessness. Also for patients on monotherapy with persistent breathlessness);

interactionsInformation.explanatoryText: http://anonymous.org/data/RecCOPD-LabaDecreaseCOPDStage2Should which suggests administration of LABA was considered as a(n) alternative recommendation but http://anonymous.org/data/RecCOPD-LabaLamaDecreaseCOPDStage2Should is acceptable in the presence of http://anonymous.org/data/RecCOPD-LabaDecreaseCOPDStage2Should

http://anonymous.org/data/RecCOPD-LabaDecreaseCOPDStage2Should which suggests administration of LABA was considered as a(n) repetition recommendation but http://anonymous.org/data/RecCOPD-LabaLamaDecreaseCOPDStage2Should is acceptable in the presence of http://anonymous.org/data/RecCOPD-LabaDecreaseCOPDStage2Should

recommendationsInformation.text: Clinician should recommend administering LABA + LAMA
recommendationsInformation.motivation: A combination of bronchodilators is recommended as initial therapy for patients with  severe breathlessness. Also for patients on monotherapy with persistent breathlessness
